movies.title: Revanche
movies.description: Ex-con Alex plans to flee to the South with his girl after a robbery. But something terrible happens and revenge seems inevitable.

movies.title: Incendies
movies.description: Twins journey to the Middle East to discover their family history and fulfill their mother's last wishes.

movies.title: OldBoy
movies.description: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

movies.title: The Hunt
movies.description: A teacher lives a lonely life, all the while struggling over his son's custody. His life slowly gets better as he finds love and receives good news from his son, but his new luck is about to be brutally shattered by an innocent little lie.

movies.title: Blue Ruin
movies.description: A mysterious outsider's quiet life is turned upside down when he returns to his childhood home to carry out an act of vengeance. But his victims are not who they seem.

movies.title: La Haine
movies.description: 24 hours in the lives of three young men in the French suburbs the day after a violent riot.

movies.title: A Girl Walks Home Alone at Night
movies.description: In Bad City, a place that reeks of death and loneliness, the townspeople are unaware they are being stalked by a lonesome vampire.

movies.title: The Handmaiden
movies.description: A woman is hired as a handmaiden to a Japanese heiress, but secretly she is involved in a plot to defraud her.

movies.title: Dead Man
movies.description: On the run after murdering a man, accountant William Blake encounters a strange aboriginal American man named Nobody who prepares him for his journey into the spiritual world.

movies.title: The Triplets of Belleville
movies.description: When her grandson is kidnapped during the Tour de France, Madame Souza and her beloved pooch Bruno team up with the Belleville Sisters--an aged song-and-dance team from the days of Fred Astaire--to rescue him.

movies.title: Deep Cover
movies.description: A uniformed cop is recruited by a drug enforcement agent to infiltrate a drug smuggling ring looking to expand its operation.

movies.title: The Big Lebowski
movies.description: Jeff 'The Dude' Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.
A harried movie director retreats into his memories and fantasies.

movies.title: The Tenant
movies.description: A bureaucrat rents a Paris apartment where he finds himself drawn into a rabbit hole of dangerous paranoia.

movies.title: Crimes of the Future
movies.description: Humans adapt to a synthetic environment, with new transformations and mutations. With his partner Caprice, Saul Tenser, celebrity performance artist, publicly showcases the metamorphosis of his organs in avant-garde performances.
